 2017-05562017-05-31,  ,  ,  ESDC,  OAG,  CMHC, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of the Auditor General of Canada
PrecisOrder Appointing (1) Ernst & Young LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as AUDITOR of the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the year 2016; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the year 2016.
